LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.label: crawler
LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.description: Small bug-like robots. While not particularly sturdy, their speed, size and numbers more than make up for it. A tiny plasma cutter at their front allows them to cut through metal like butter. Their favorite passtime is open surgery.
LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.tools.0.label: plasma cutter
LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.tools.1.label: front legs
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.label: skullywag
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.description: The skullywag is a light armored mechanoid with one thing on it's artificial mind: Incapacitate all hostiles for assimilation. Beware its paralyzing ComponentIndustrial.
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.tools.0.label: front paralyze component
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.tools.1.label: head
